title: Baby Carrier
description: eight horizontal rows of appliqued multicolored parrot-like birds interspersed with smaller geometric sections separated by ribbon and fabric applique strips; bottom left and right border have blue and red bands; top borders are five rows of grey and green alternating; backing is black; some metallic stitching
creditline: The Ruth Ann Dayton Chinese Room Endowment Fund, The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art, and The Helen Jones Fund for Asian Art
